title: PMS 2.0 538 - OVERREACTION MONDAY, NFL Week 10 Recap With Darius Butler & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ, Darius Butler, and the boys overreact to everything that happened during week 10 of the NFL season and discuss everything from Aaron Rodgers and the Packers defense dominating Russell Wilson and the Seahawks at Lambeau, Cam Newton's big return to Carolina after the Panthers beat the hell out of the Cardinals, the Patriots being all the way back, the Colts continuing to put things together, the Titans increasing their hold on the AFC, the Steelers and the Lions playing to a tie in what was maybe one of the worst games of all-time, the Chiefs finding their swagger and potentially putting a dagger in the Chiefs' season, what the biggest takeaways are, who is looking like a real contender, and everything else that happened in an eventful week 10 ahead of tonight's Monday Night Football game between the Rams and 49ers. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
